docs.snippet: CHESTER, Pa., March 1 -- Blessed by Bishop William T. Manning of the Protestant Episcopal Diocese of New York, the passenger liner Rio de la Plata, 17,500 tons, slid into the Delaware River this afternoon at the plant of the Sun Shipbuilding and...
docs.lead_paragraph: CHESTER, Pa., March 1 -- Blessed by Bishop William T. Manning of the Protestant Episcopal Diocese of New York, the passenger liner Rio de la Plata, 17,500 tons, slid into the Delaware River this afternoon at the plant of the Sun Shipbuilding and Drydock Company.

headline.main: MANNING BLESSES SHIP AT LAUNCHING; Bishop Prays Rio de la Plata Will Be Ambassador of Good-Will to Latin America CEREMONY IS BROADCAST Wife of Envoy From Argentina Sponsors Third of Vessels Built at Chester, Pa.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, March 8 -- South American countries are revising their attitude toward the war as the result of Adolf Hitler's recent diplomatic victories in the Balkans, the extension of German influence in Europe and reports of the renewal...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, March 8 -- South American countries are revising their attitude toward the war as the result of Adolf Hitler's recent diplomatic victories in the Balkans, the extension of German influence in Europe and reports of the renewal of submarine warfare against British shipping.

docs.snippet: Hugo Balzo, Uruguayan pianist, made his New York debut yesterday afternoon at the Town Hall. His recital was sponsored by the Union de Mujeres Americanas (the United Women of the Americas) as part of the organization's program for fostering better...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hugo Balzo, Uruguayan pianist, made his New York debut yesterday afternoon at the Town Hall. His recital was sponsored by the Union de Mujeres Americanas (the United Women of the Americas) as part of the organization's program for fostering better cultural relations between North and South America.

docs.snippet: The foreign exchange market last week developed little business and less in the way of important price changes worthy of that term, which reflects the fact that except at a month-end, when maturing contracts, have to be adjusted, the stabilization...
docs.lead_paragraph: The foreign exchange market last week developed little business and less in the way of important price changes worthy of that term, which reflects the fact that except at a month-end, when maturing contracts, have to be adjusted, the stabilization boards operating in the various currencies have things pretty much under control.

docs.snippet: Any one who has recently been to England knows that the argument that the United States should stop giving aid to Britain on the grounds that Britain is already defeated, is untrue.
